archimate:Resource.name: Integration Layer: Integration Controller
archimate:Resource.documentation: This ABB is responsible for coordinating and brokering or mediating the interactions between the applications, database, security, etc. that need to work in concert to effectively provide a runtime experience.

properties.value: This ABB is responsible for coordinating and brokering or mediating the interactions between the applications, database, security, etc. that need to work in concert to effectively provide a runtime experience.
